cast.overview: Peter Rabbit runs away from his human family when he learns they are going to portray him in a bad light in their book. Soon, he crosses paths with an older rabbit who ropes him into a heist.
cast.title: Peter Rabbit 2: The Runaway

details.biography: Aimee Horner is a versatile British performer and vocal coach based in Birmingham, England. She has extensive experience in acting, presenting, music, and dance, with a background in musicals, pantomimes, and touring theatre productions across the UK and internationally.  Horner is also a professional singer, performing solo and in duos at various events.  In addition to her performance career, she serves as a vocal coach at The RJ Academy, where she leverages her industry experience to mentor aspiring singers and performers.
details.name: Aimee Horne
